repnme.cdata!: Bangladesh - Fourth Imports Program Credit Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Fourth Imports Program Project will
            make available foreign exchange for the import of industrial
            components, chemicals, raw materials, spare parts and
            packing materials to enable selected high priority
            industries to maintain or expand their production.
